contentList.content: RANGERCOMPANION
RANGERCOMPANIONTAGFORRANGEROVERHAUL

The bond between you and your Ranger Companion is unbreakable. Their stats increase for each of your Ranger levels.

In addition, your Ranger Companion will gain various passive effects depending on the passives that you receive while leveling.
Ranger's Companion
Conjure Rangers Companion
Summon a beast companion of your choice. Your companion grows in strength alongside you as you level.

Affected creature's stats increase for every level of its summoning Ranger.

In addition, it gains various passive effects depending on the passives that its Ranger possesses.
Natural Focus
The number of times you can utilize your unique skills as a Ranger.
Natural Movement

Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hide</LSTag> using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag>. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Bear Companion
Summon a bear that can endure heavy attacks and draw the enemy's attention with its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_GoadingRoar_Bear_Summon">Goading Roar</LSTag>.
Fierce Paws

Lash out with fierce paws and potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarm</LSTag> your target. If it isn't holding any weapons, it potentially falls <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> instead.
Ursine Devastation
Pounce upon your targets, possibly inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on any enemies caught under your weight.
Dilophosaurus Companion
Summon a dilophosaurus that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_CorrosiveSpit_Dilophosaurus">Spew Acid</LSTag> at its enemies.
Pounce
Pounce at an enemy, lashing it with your claws.
Disarming Bite
Clamp your jaws down tight on a creature's arm, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarming</LSTag> them.
Dire Raven Companion
Summon a dire raven that can fly and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_RendVision_Raven_Summon">Blind</LSTag> its enemies.
Dire Wolf Companion
Summon a wolf that can inflict devastating wounds and rally the party to move forward with its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire">Howl</LSTag>.
Howl of the Pack
Summon an additional Wolf to help you in combat. Only one Wolf may be summoned by this action at a time.
Giant Spider Companion

Summon a giant spider that can shoot <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider_Summon">Webs</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> enemies with its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_GiantSpider_Wildshape">Bite</LSTag>.
Eagle Eyed
When making an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, you roll your damage with Advantage as well.
You've chosen to cultivate the bond with your beastial companion, a choice that strengthens both of you in equal measure.
Nevermore
You will not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Netherese Plumes
Create a pocket of darkness, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> all who enter.
Disengage
Spear of the Wildfront

Damage dealt by your Ranger Companion is rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. However, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against them are rolled with Advantage as well. This can be toggled at any time.
Spear of the Wildfront

Damage dealt by your Ranger Companion is rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. However, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against them are rolled with Advantage as well. This can be toggled at any time.
Spear of the Wildfront

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when rolling for damage. However, enemies also have Advantage when making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against it.
Woodland Synergy
While within [1] of your Ranger Companion, you both gain a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Woodland Synergy

Affected creature is providing their summoning Ranger with a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while remaining within [1] of them.
Woodland Synergy
Affected creature has a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while remaining within [1] of their Ranger Companion.
Bestial Fury
Your Ranger Companions may make an additional free attack each turn.
Bestial Fury
Affected creature may make an additional free attack each turn.
Critical Bonds

After landing a killing blow, the next time your Ranger Companion deals damage it will roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>. Conversely, after your Ranger Companion lands a killing blow, the next time you deal damage it will also roll as a Critical Hit.
Critical Bonds
After landing a killing blow, the next time your summoning Ranger deals damage they will roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Critical Bonds
Affected creature will roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> the next time it deals damage.
Bestial Rampage
Your Ranger Companions gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Bestial Rampage
Affected creature has an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Leader of the Pack
Gain the ability to summon two of the same Ranger Companions at once.
Gloom Stalker's Initiative
Gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative. In addition, you are able to see in the dark, both magical and non-magical, up to [2].
Dread Shot
Once per combat, you may make a weapon attack which will always roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Dread Shot
Affected creature can make a weapon attack which guarantees a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Dread Shot (Melee)
Ambush a target with an additional swift and precise weapon attack. This attack will always roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Dread Shot (Ranged)
Ambush a target with an additional swift and precise weapon attack. This attack will always roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Gloom Stalker's Deceit
Upon failing an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you may spend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to turn it into a success.
Gloom Stalker's Deceit
Upon failing an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, turn it into a success.
Dread Fletched
When rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against a target, you may also cause them to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terrified</LSTag> for one turn.
Gloom Stalker's Cruelty
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terrified</LSTag> target will always roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Dread Ambusher
On the first turn of combat, every successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will be rolled as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Dread Ambusher
Affected creature will roll every successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Natural Hunter

When you deal damage with a weapon, you apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTED">Hunted</LSTag>. Each stack of Hunted will reduce your targets <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1], up to a maximum of [2].
Hunted
Affected creature is being hunted by a nearby Ranger. Each stack of Hunted has reduced their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1].
Opportune Strike

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally, you may spend a charge of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag> in order to make a weapon-based Attack Roll against their aggressor.
Opportune Strike
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally, make a weapon-based Attack Roll against their aggressor.
Horde Breaker
Gain the ability to target two creatures standing within [1] of each other.
Horde Breaker (Melee)

Target two creatures standing close to each other. Attack the first creature and then gain the ability to make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against the second as a free action.
Horde Breaker (Ranged)

Target two creatures standing close to each other. Attack the first creature and then gain the ability to make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against the second as a free action.
Horde Breaker
Affected creature is open to an additional, free attack from the Ranger who applied this status.
Marksman's Eye

When damaging a target you are currently <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTED">Hunting</LSTag>, you gain a bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> equal to the amount of stacks they have remaining.
Volley
Loose a volley of arrows within an area, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against each target.
Whirlwind
Strike out at all nearby foes, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against each target.
On the Hunt

When damaging a target you are currently <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTED">Hunting</LSTag>, you roll your damage dice with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and ignore all forms of physical <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.
Swarmkeeper
You have forged a deep connection with your natural surroundings, forming magical bonds with swarms of nature spirits.

Spirits of nature flock to your company.
Bonds which bind you to the Feywild.
Adventures which bind you to your companions.
Recall Swarm
Recall your swarm of spirits, so that you may use them again.
Colony of Bees

Surround yourself in a swarm of bees. While surrounding you, being damaged by a Melee Weapon Attack will deal Piercing damage to your aggressor equal to your Proficiency Bonus multiplied by two.

In addition, while active you may also utilize your bees to teleport to an unoccupied space within [1] of you. Alternatively, you may send your bees after a non-allied target of your choosing to deal [2] at the start of each of their turns.
Colony of Bees: Teleport
Once per turn, use your swarm of bees to carry you to a new location within [1].
Colony of Bees: Swarm

Use your swarm of bees deal Piercing damage to a non-allied creature at the start of each of their turns.

Upon using this action, you will be unable to utilize your bee spirits again until recalled. Spirits are automatically recalled at the end of combat.
Swarmed by Bees
Affected creature is taking [1] at the start of each of their turns due to a swarm of bees.
Bloom of Jellyfish

Surround yourself in a swarm of jellyfish. While surrounding you in combat, you regain Hit Points each turn equal to your Proficiency Bonus multiplied by four.

In addition, while active your jellyfish will strike out at enemies who damage you. Alternatively, you may send your jellyfish after an allied target of your choosing to cause them to receive their protection instead.
Bloom of Jellyfish: Protection
Use your swarm of jellyfish to retaliate against approaching enemies upon being damaged, dealing [1].
Bloom of Jellyfish: Soothe

Use your swarm of jellyfish to sooth an allies wounds in combat, causing them to regain Hit Points each turn equal to their Proficiency Bonus multiplied by four. In addition, the jellyfish will strike out at enemies who get within their reach, and they will be able to send the jellyfish to another target of their choosing at any time.

Upon using this action, you will be unable to utilize your jellyfish spirits again until recalled. Spirits are automatically recalled at the end of combat.
Soothed by Jellyfish
Affected creature is regaining <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> each turn equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> multiplied by four.
Eclipse of Moths

Surround yourself in a swarm of moths. While surrounding you, you roll with a +1d4 bonus on all Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

In addition, while within [1] of an ally, they receive this bonus as well. Alternatively, you may send your moths after an non-allied target of your choosing to cause them, and all creatures within [1] of them, to roll with a -1d4 penalty instead.
Protected by Moths
Affected creature is rolls with a +1d4 bonus on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Eclipse of Moths: Distraction

Use your swarm of moths to distract an enemy, causing them to roll with a -1d4 penalty on all Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

Upon using this action, you will be unable to utilize your moth spirits again until recalled. Spirits are automatically recalled at the end of combat.
Distracted by Moths
Affected creature is distracted, and as such, will roll with a -1d4 penalty on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Free Spirited

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on an enemy affected by your swarms, restore one charge of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag>.
Empowered Swarms

Your swarms are now capable of targeting two creatures at once. Each time a creature affected by one of your swarms dies, you may use it again, even if another creature affected by a swarm still lives.
Writhing Tide

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against enemies affected by your swarms are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Additionally, Attack Rolls made against allies affected by your swarms are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Frontier Ballistics
Use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag> to fire various types of unique arrows.
Arrow of Aberration Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfAberrationSlaying">Arrow of Aberration Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Acid
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfAcid">Arrow of Acid</LSTag>.
Arrow of Arcane Interference
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfAntimagic">Arrow of Arcane Interference</LSTag>.
Arrow of Beast Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfBeastSlaying">Arrow of Beast Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Construct Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfConstructSlaying">Arrow of Construct Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Darkness
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfDarkness">Arrow of Darkness</LSTag>.
Arrow of Elemental Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfElementalSlaying">Arrow of Elemental Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Fiend Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfFiendSlaying">Arrow of Fiend Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Fire
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfFire">Arrow of Fire</LSTag>.
Arrow of Humanoid Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfHumanoidSlaying">Arrow of Humanoid Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Ice
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfIce">Arrow of Ice</LSTag>.
Arrow of Ilmater
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfWraithsEmbrace">Arrow of Ilmater</LSTag>.
Arrow of Lightning
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfLightning">Arrow of Lightning</LSTag>.
Arrow of Many Targets
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfRicochet">Arrow of Many Targets</LSTag>.
Arrow of Monstrosity Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfMonstrositySlaying">Arrow of Monstrosity Slaying</LSTag>.
Arrow of Piercing
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfPiercing">Arrow of Piercing</LSTag>.
Arrow of Roaring Thunder
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfDetonation">Arrow of Roaring Thunder</LSTag>.
Arrow of Salving
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfDispelling">Arrow of Salving</LSTag>.
Arrow of Teleportation
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfTeleportation">Arrow of Teleportation</LSTag>.
Arrow of Undead Slaying
Gain the ability to fire an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ArrowOfUndeadSlaying">Arrow of Undead Slaying</LSTag>.
Bestial Bonds
Affected creature is benefiting from one or more passives provided by its summoning Ranger.
Frontier Accolades

Your skills lay bare an expanse of improvement.
Expertise which has thrived uncontested upon an untamed fringe.
Frontier Ballistics
Select from a variety of special arrows. These arrows are fired using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag>.
Ambush Breaker
Gain a +2 bonus to your Initiative. You can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
Ballistic Infusion
You are capable of upcasting your Frontier Ballistics using your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>, causing them to deal an additional [1] per Spell Slot spent.
Ballistic Infusion
Infuse your Frontier Ballistics with <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag> to cause empower them, causing them to deal an additional [1] per Spell Slot spent.
Bounty Hunter

Throughout your journey, creatures you encounter may be marked as bounty targets by forces unknown. Killing a bounty target will award you 100 gold. Upon killing a Dangerous creature, you are awarded 500 gold. Upon killing a Fatal creature, you are awarded 1,000 gold.

All Attack Rolls you make against targets with bounties on their heads are rolled with Advantage.
Bounty Placed
Affected creature has a bounty on their head. Killing them will award additional gold.
Bounty Completed
Affected creature has turned in a bounty and received their reward.
Observe for Bounties
Observe the creatures around you to check if any bounty targets are nearby.
Bestial Foresight
While not in combat, you may summon your Ranger Companion without consuming charges of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag>.
Beastbond's Precision
Gain a +4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made with <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag>.
Beastbond's Precision
Affected creature has a +4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Blood Bond
Creatures that you summon become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage.
Close Quarters Shooter

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLANKED">Threatened</LSTag> by one enemy, you will not receive <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on ranged attacks when attacking them, and all <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> roll their damage with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> for as long as you remain Threatened. If Threatened by two or more enemies, standard rules will apply to your accuracy.
Escapist
You no longer provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Explosive Arrowheads

When you deal damage with a ranged weapon, you deal Force damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> multiplied by 2 in a [1] area. This can be toggled at any time.
Hidden Inventory

Once per turn, upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on an enemy, restore one charge of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Focus</LSTag>.
Marksman's Edge
When you deal damage with a weapon, you have a chance to leave the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>.
Multi-Attack Defence

When an enemy attacks you, they have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on any additional <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you until the start of their next turn.
Multi-Attack Defence
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against the attacked Ranger who possesses this passive.
Natural Huntsman
Making an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> gives you a +2 bonus to additional Attack Rolls for the rest of your turn. This effect can stack.
Natural Huntsman
Affected creature has a +2 bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for each stack of Natural Huntsman.
Natural Opportunity

Gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. In addition, <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> that you make will attack with both weapons.
Protective Bond
Creatures that you summon receive a +4 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Sniper

When dealing damage to another creature with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, deal an additional instance of [1] for every [2] between you and your target, up to a maximum of [3].
Superior Technique
When dealing damage, you ignore Piercing <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.
Sure Shot
The number needed to land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while making a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> is reduced by 1.
Two-Weapon Fighting
<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage rolls made with your off-hand weapon are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Wanton Synergy

Once per turn, upon landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, your summoned creatures' next instance of damage will also be a Critical Hit. Your summoned creatures must be within [1] of you to receive this effect.
Wanton Synergy
Affected creature will land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> the next time that they make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
